overview.en: BSC Using block chain technology to build a public chain for the whole tourism industry, which consists of three parts: the global tourism asset certification platform, the certification bank and the intelligent agriculture management platform, supports the healthy circulation of industrial certification, and constructs a new pattern of the global tourism industry certification.
overview.zh: BSC 利用区块链技术打造的作用于整个全域旅游产业的公链，由全域旅游资产通 证平台、通证银行、智慧农业管理平台三大板块组成,支持 产业通证的健康流通，构筑全域旅游产业通证化全新格局。
